properties.Name: FinancialStatementValue
properties.Description: The values that corresponds to the line / column of the financial statement.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementLineId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement Line.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementColumnId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a financial statement column.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementTextValue
Columns.Description: The text value that corresponds to the line / column. This value will only be populated when  the Text Indicator of the FINANCIAL STATEMENT LINE is set to true.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementNumericValue
Columns.Description: The numeric value that corresponds to the line / column. This value will only be populated when  the Numeric Indicator of the FINANCIAL STATEMENT LINE is set to true.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementPercentageValue
Columns.Description: The percentage value that corresponds to the line / column. This value will only be populated when  the Percentage Indicator of the FINANCIAL STATEMENT LINE is set to true.
